generated_body: If you click on the article titled "'We always believe': Win over 49ers proves Seattle Seahawks' mindset is more than just lip service," you can expect a detailed analysis of the Seattle Seahawks' recent victory against the San Francisco 49ers. Additionally, it may include insights from players and coaches about their mindset during the game, as well as implications for their future matches. Overall, the article could provide a deeper understanding of the Seahawks' approach and strategy moving forward.
